value.name: The Numbers Tell a Different Story About Police Killings of Minors
value.description: Ciara Meyer was 12 when a constable came to her home in Perry County, Pennsylvania, to serve an eviction notice to her father, who pointed a rifle at the constable. The constable opened fire ...
